title: Four Draft Prospects You Should Start Looking Up Now | The Mismatch
description:
We chat about whether the proposed NBA H-O-R-S-E tournament will be entertaining or a bust (1:31), before reviewing the news that the Bulls will hire Arturas Karnisovas as their new executive vice president of basketball operations (6:15). Then, amid uncertainty about the rest of the regular season, we look ahead to the NBA draft and give four prospects we think you should be familiarizing yourself with (16:05).

Hosts: Chris Vernon and Kevin O’Connor

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
